Document.Title: Opening files with the VS 6.0 Development Environment

Content:
Icons: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\VIntDev98\bin\vidisws.dll

Confirm open after download

Action > open
Application used to perform action: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual
Studio\Common\IDE\IDE98\devenv.exe" "%1"

Use DDE

DDE Message: Open("%1")
Application: vstudio
Topic: system
